DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine monoamine oxidase B ( MAO-B ) total distribution volume ( VT ) , phenelzine treatment extent .
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects receive PET MRI scan treatment phenelzine .
DOC.criteria: 1880 year age good physical health Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders ( DSMIV ) diagnosis current major depressive episode ( MDE ) DSMIV diagnosis major depressive disorder ( MDD ) verify SCID DSMIV psychiatric consultation great 17 17 item HDRS ( Hamilton Depression Rating Scale ) . history nonresponse several different antidepressant class herbal , drug medication use ( affect CNS function ) suicide attempts drug medication use within eight week ( +5 half live medication ) history substance abuse neurotoxin use history psychotic symptom history central nervous system ( CNS ) medical illness current substance abuse test positive pregnancy test ( woman )
